mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_images ( review_image_url, file_size, extension, image_created_date, review_id ) VALUES ( #{reviewImageUrl}, #{fileSize}, #{extension}, #{creationDate}, #{reviewId} )
mapper.select: SELECT ri.review_image_url FROM review_images ri JOIN reviews r ON ri.review_id = r.review_id JOIN order_products op ON r.order_product_id = op.order_product_id WHERE op.product_name = #{productName} ORDER BY ri.image_created_date DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
